We inherited a bad accreditation system for higher education, which did not guarantee quality or prevent corruption.
Today we present the project that creates the National Accreditation Agency, to improve the quality of the Higher Education system.
This Agency will be autonomous of higher education institution, its members will be elected by the High Public Management and ratified by the Senate.
This project establishes accreditation criteria much more demanding than the current ones, which will guarantee the quality of higher education
